channel.title: Messed up player killing(508)
channel.description: hey moparscape on my server about 75% of the time people pk the server crashes(there are few, very rare times it works) it dosent crash until one person dies and i get this error Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at Bulby.players.Player.applyDead(Player.java:4370) at Bulby.players.Player.process(Player.java:4118) at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:226) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) im using davidscape version 2 please help me fix this much thanks, hoopdude75

item.title: Messed up player killing(508)
item.dc:creator: @hoopdude75 hoopdude75
item.description:
@hoopdude75 wrote:

can you please explain a little better im not to good at coding i mess up the server way too many times with coding mistakes
thanks,
your a great coder

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up player killing(508)
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Yeah, this was fixed in later versions. Bulby didn’t add the correct null checks in pvp and npcvp. Add a

if(p != null) {

or something like that in the correct spot.

Read full topic

item.title: Messed up player killing(508)
item.dc:creator: @hoopdude75 hoopdude75
item.description:
@hoopdude75 wrote:

hey moparscape
on my server about 75% of the time people pk the server crashes(there are few, very rare times it works) it dosent crash until one person dies and i get this error
Exception in thread “Thread-0” java.lang.NullPointerException
at Bulby.players.Player.applyDead(Player.java:4370)
at Bulby.players.Player.process(Player.java:4118)
at Bulby.Engine.run(Engine.java:226)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
im using davidscape version 2 please help me fix this
much thanks,
hoopdude75
